channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

item.title: [GRA9][Virtual Private Servers] - Upgrade infrastructure
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 10, 07:00 - 07:30 UTC

Feb 16, 08:55 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 10/03/2022 07:00 UTC
End time : 10/03/2022 07:30 UTC
Service impact : The impacted servers cannot be manipulated (reboot, reinstallation...) during this operation.
Servers continue to operate normally during maintenance and new orders can be delivered.
Service improvement : Upgrade of the Virtual Private Servers infrastructure (RabbitMQ servers)

item.title: [RBX6][BAREMETAL] - 46d18 ,46D17
item.description:
Feb 25, 07:57 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 24/02/2022 19:13 UTC
End Time : 25/02/2022 06:50 UTC
Service impacted : 19 servers were unreachable
Root cause : Disjunction caused by a water leak

Feb 25, 04:57 UTC
Update - All impacted servers in rack 46D17 are accessible again.
However, there is still one server on rack 46D18 that is not accessible, it is being checked.

Feb 25, 01:09 UTC
Identified - Our teams are always working on the root cause of the incident to get the service up and running as soon as possible.

Feb 24, 19:59 UTC
Update - Update :18 servers are unreachable

Feb 24, 19:28 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 24/02/2022 19:13 UTC
Service impact : 19 servers are unreachable
Ongoing actions : Our tecnicians are currently working on

item.title: [RBX6][Dedicated Servers-Global Infrastructure] - 46D19
item.description:
Feb 24, 16:09 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 24/02/2022 15:03UTC
End Time : 24/02/2022 15:15 UTC
Service impact : 29 servers were impacted
Root cause :A power disjunction caused this incident. The energy was reloaded after.

item.title: [RBX2][Network] - Vrack Network
item.description:
Feb 24, 15:44 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 24/02/2022 14:55 UTC
End Time : 24/02/2022 15:35 UTC
Service impact : The vRack network is now fully operational
Root cause : One of the switches managing the vRack network on RBX2 had a software failure. Our technical teams have rebooted and troubleshooted the hardware

Feb 24, 15:27 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 24/02/2022 14:55 UTC
Service impact : Vrack network could be unavailable
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams reboot the switch responsible for this unavailability

item.title: [BHS1][Dedicated Servers] - T01C25 Public network
item.description:
Feb 24, 13:45 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 24/02/2022 12:05 UTC
End Time : 24/02/2022 13:15 UTC
Service impacted : Servers in the T01C25 rack were no longer connected to the public network. Root cause : A failure on a switch caused this incident

Feb 24, 12:37 UTC
Update - UpdateAccording to our first estimation, the switch will be replaced and functional within half an hour.

Feb 24, 12:22 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 24/02/2022 12:05 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the T01C25 rack is no longer connected to the public network. A failure on a switch caused this incident
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams replace the faulty switch
